```{r western}

root_directory<-"~/smith_thesis_2017/PreparePipeline/"
R_script_input_directory<-"~/smith_thesis_2017/AnalysisPipeline/Script_input/"

Western<-read.csv(paste0(root_directory,"western_summary.csv"))
Western$BCS<-factor(Western$BCS,levels = c("L. crispatus","L. jensenii","L. iners","G. vaginalis","Cell Culture Medium","0.1% DL lactic acid","miR-193b mimic","scramble control"),ordered = T)

save(Western,file=paste0(R_script_input_directory,"Western.Rmd"))
```
